author: owl4219
content:
Can anyone explain security implications of this issue to Eth2 PoS? https://github.com/cfrg/draft-irtf-cfrg-bls-signature/issues/38 
Though this PR is merged into irtf draft, it doesn't yet seem to be implemented in blst 0.3.3 (it follows irtf draft v4), which is used by lighthouse client 3.4.0 by default: https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/38514c07f222ff7783834c48cf5c0a6ee7f346d0/crypto/bls/Cargo.toml#L23
Am i misunderstanding anything?

author: sproul
content:
Lighthouse actually uses blst 0.3.10 in v3.4.0: <https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/38514c07f222ff7783834c48cf5c0a6ee7f346d0/Cargo.lock#L769-L770>

the 0.3.10 is semver compatible with the 0.3.3 dependency spec, so it got upgraded to automatically

author: sproul
content: as for the vuln, I think we already deal with this in our usage of `FastAggregateVerify` at the spec level, although it's been a while since I looked in detail
